data.title: Colors of Ukrainian flags are identical with flag of Leipzig
data.meta_description:
Have you noticed that the colors of the digital version of the Ukrainian national flag are absolutely identical to the flag of the city of Leipzig? I think this is a good sign :wink: 
Ukrainian flag: 
 
Leipzig flag:
data.text:
Have you noticed that the colors of the digital version of the Ukrainian national flag are absolutely identical to the flag of the city of Leipzig? I think this is a good sign

Ukrainian flag:

Leipzig flag:

Do those flags have a common history by chance?

Sussex

Several flags have similar colors but different patterns. The EU and Sweden for example.

But except for the fact that there is their emblem in the middle.

Do you mean the Leipzig flag? Yes, that’s because cities and towns don’t actually have their own flags, only a coat of arms. That is, strictly speaking, the city of Leipzig does not have a flag, but only its coat of arms, which it presents and brands on a flag for marketing reasons.
